action.name: Set text
action.param: "If you think it’s bad out there, wait until you get to the surface."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Don’t get me wrong, there are some good things here. Like the tech; how else would I be talking to people from the past right now?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But other than that, life on Earth in 2100 kinda…"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But other than that, life on Earth in 2100 kinda… sucks..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But other than that, life on Earth in 2100 kinda… sucks... A lot."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Aww, c’mon, r-really? Geez, I’m sorry; technical difficulties still exist in 2100 for whatever reason. People in the past need to figure out how to fix that too."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hey past people! My name’s Hana. I’m a meteorologist from the year 2100."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I’m contacting a bunch of you because, technically speaking, you’re our last hope."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "See, when Earth’s temperature started to seriously affect our lives, a lot of us tried to fix the damage... But it was too late."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Things are at the point of no return now. Food and water are scarce, New York City is the new lost city of Atlantis…"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "People are even migrating North because of the heat waves that have already burnt so many crops and forests to a crisp."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I would say that that’s just the tip of the iceberg, but icebergs don’t exist anymore..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But luckily for all of us, you can stop that from ever happening!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "If you can help change how humans lived in your time, there is a chance we can save the world from turning into what you just saw."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "We need you all to save us, the future, and yourselves…"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But more importantly us because I’m tired of dealing with near human extinction."
